recipes.title: Dials (Water/Lava/Fire/Thunder/Impact)
lines: §lDials§r are strange, mysterious devices made from the remains of particular shellfish, which have the ability to store energy and matter. The shellfish originate from Skypiea.
Empty Dial: Doesn't do anything, but they are the base ingredient for crafting all other Dials.
§9Water§r Dial: Places a water block (Like bucket but it is stackable).
§4Lava§r Dial: Places a lava block (Like bucket but it is stackable).
§6Fire§r Dial: Surrounds the Player with fire.
§cImpact§r Dial: Damages the targeted Player or mob
Dials can also be loaded into a Kabuto, and be thrown as projectiles. When they hit a block they will activate.
Empty Dials can only be obtained by trading with Skypieans, so a Skypiea Island must be found first in order to get Dials.
